node.title: A Simple and Fast Object Mapper
node.description: .NET Boxed mapper is an object to object mapper that is simpler and faster than Automapper and makes zero allocations of memory, thus making the garbage collector do less work.

node.title: Is ASP.NET Core now a Mature Platform?
node.description: ASP.NET Core a large developer base, a large number of GitHub projects, Stack Overflow questions, bloggers and companies who use it. It's a mature platform.

node.title: .NET Boxed
node.description: .NET Boxed is a set of project templates with batteries included, providing the minimum amount of code required to get you going faster.

node.title: ASP.NET Core Caching in Practice
node.description: How to use and implement Cache-Control, Cache-Control Immutable, E-Tag, Last-Modified and If-Modified-Since Caching HTTP headers in ASP.NET Core.

node.title: Structured Data using Schema.NET
node.description: Schema.NET is Schema.org objects turned into strongly typed C# POCO classes for use in .NET.

node.title: ASP.NET Core Lazy Command Pattern
node.description: Move your ASP.NET Core MVC action method logic into lazily loaded commands using the command pattern, to reduce Controller complexity.

node.title: dotnet new Feature Selection
node.description: How to add feature selection to your dotnet new template using symbols (bool, string, choice, computed) and pre-processor directives.

node.title: Cleaning Up CSPROJ
node.description: I show how to make the new Visual Studio 2017 .NET Core based csproj XML concise and pretty for hand editing.

node.title: Cross-Platform DevOps for .NET Core
node.description: Learn how to use Cake, AppVeyor and Travis CI continuous integration build systems to perform cross-platform DevOps for .NET Core based projects.
